Great @ChicagoHR event today with 3 first-time CEOs talking to 300 HR pros. #HRMAC
Thanks for the follow @seanrehder, let's catch up soon!
"Put the turd right on the table." - @WarrantyGroup CEO talking about need for transparency from HR. #HRMAC
IDEX CEO - have to have people who are brutally honest. Call out horrible ideas even early on. #HRMAC
@chicCPA Just tell me how you can help the business and let's do it. #HRMAC
@chicCPA Understand the value HR brings and leverage that with leaders, esp when new. HR needs to be assertive, provide leadership. #HRMAC
@WarrantyGroup CEO generates lots of ideas. Wants people to tell him what is a bad idea and why. Need that from HR. #HRMAC
There are more unknowns and more differences than you expect as a leader. If HR is great, they provide critical perspective. #HRMAC
As tech handles administrative work, there is capacity for Human Capital to do more to manage people says IDEX CEO. #HRMAC
HR is responsible for talent in company, just like Gen Mgr of sports team says IDEX CEO. Watch out if leaders don't believe that. #HRMAC
IDEX CEO - if you as HR leader can't become a strategic partner to biz leader within 6 months, go get a different job. #HRMAC
IDEX CEO - Plan numbers have to be hit, signed in blood. Stretch goals are different. Success is somewhere between the two. #HRMAC
IDEX Corp CEO "we want people to grow, not shrink and fear makes people shrink." #HRMAC
@WarrantyGroup CEO banned the word "goals" and changed to "commitments" with specific rewards and consequences. #HRMAC
"That guy is going to last about 2 weeks" - what some employees said about the new @WarrantyGroup CEO 18 months ago. Still there... #HRMAC
@WarrantyGroup CEO had to drive change from 27 silos into one company. Only could happen from an outsider. #HRMAC
"We have to empower from the inside out" says YWCA CEO @chicCPA #HRMAC
Headed to @ChicagoHR breakfast and CEO panel. 3 CEOs on stage sharing with HR pros. Very cool.

"I'm all about the free!" @thecandidategen - great preso at #sourcecon on FB Graph and other great tools
@talentcommunity Data mining takes 10-15 hours per 500 prospects, says Marvin @talentcommunity #sourcecon
@marknexus Make technologies less buzzword-y and more practical. #sourcecon
Mark Tortorici, @marknexus, says we need teams to stay relevant in tech and sourcing. Critical thing. Helps in the long run. #sourcecon
@vlastelica when HMs question the top of the funnel numbers, they are really saying they don't trust the results.
Recruiters are digital marketers whether we like it or not @islanddad #sourcecon
@vlastelica can use bit.ly to condense long Hiring Mgr's urls for their postings and track clicks and traction. #sourcecon #lessonslearned
@islanddad our hiring mgrs hiring rates are published to keep them engaged. Want culture of recruiting. #sourcecon
Tito Magobet - If you don't measure it, you can't optimize it. #sourcecon #lessonslearned
Leading and trailing metrics - measure both. Much harder for anyone to game the system. Tito Magobet at #sourcecon #lessonslearned
When a sourcer gets a candidate to a tech phone screen, they have brought quality to the org. Tito Magobet at #sourcecon. #lessonslearned
Desire to do tech phone screen of candidate = quality candidate says Tito Magobet at #sourcecon. Use numbers to show quality.
Creating metrics is an Agile effort - must iterate. Need to measure What and How something is done. Tito Magobet at #sourcecon
How to show value? "Tie % of cand's hired from sourcers and 360 feedback between sourcing / recruiting" from Lori Carlson #sourcecon
@vlastelica asks "Who has good or great workforce planning?" 9 hands out of over 400 attendees go up at #sourcecon
"Pushback and protecting resources are critical skills for sourcing leaders" says @vlastelica at #sourcecon
70% of time wasted with sourcing and recruiting is in the handoffs. Phil Hendrickson  #sourcecon
